short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your cursor for website presentations with a clearer visual journey.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is designed to elevate your web presentations to the next level. With just one click, it transforms your cursor into a sleek and attractive tool that allows you to highlight key elements on your screen during your online meetings. You no longer have to rely solely on verbal explanations; simply point and emphasize what you want to effectively and visually communicate. Streamline your web demos and conferences with style using this extension that will make your presentation memorable and professional.
